Module RoboRally
Package viewmodels

Class StageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • viewmodels.StageController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable, IController
    public class StageController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, IController
    This controller class is responsible for the board and the chat. GridPane 'stage' adapts automatically to the users' screen setup. Stage GUI and its elements are fully responsive. It loads furthermore the initial start screen and the select robot screen.

      void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
